author: boisvert
msg: 1) MockScheduler now only triggers persistent schedules when and iff the transaction commits
2) Fixed an insidious bug where process hydration was not occuring completely synchronously.

msg: Renamed breaking test cases, I'm not sure how these test cases could work at all as they'd need a separate running tomcat hosting the application that they talk to.
